tool_description: An API showing all the latest Crypto News in the UK
name: Crypto News UK
title: Crypto News UK

api_list.name: Get Individual News Source News
api_list.description: Get News about Crypto from a specific news resource
api_list.code:
import requests

url = "https://crypto-news-uk.p.rapidapi.com/news/gua"

headers = {
            "X-RapidAPI-Key": "SIGN-UP-FOR-KEY",
            "X-RapidAPI-Host": "crypto-news-uk.p.rapidapi.com"
        }

response = requests.get(url, headers=headers)
print(response.json())
api_list.convert_code:
import requests

url = "https://crypto-news-uk.p.rapidapi.com/news/{newspaperid}"

headers = {
            "X-RapidAPI-Key": "SIGN-UP-FOR-KEY",
            "X-RapidAPI-Host": "crypto-news-uk.p.rapidapi.com"
        }

response = requests.get(url, headers=headers)
print(response.json())

api_list.name: Get All Crypto News
api_list.description: This endpoint will return back all news about Crypto from the UK
